## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project coding standards (80 char lines, Allman braces, file headers)
- [ ] Functions have documentation comments (purpose, params, return, last update)
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced (XSS, injection)
- [ ] All 4 languages tested (IT, EN, DE, FR)
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm run test`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Responsive design verified (mobile + desktop)
- [ ] Accessibility checked (keyboard nav, screen readers)
